themes: love of the body / holy flesh
serendipity: right place, right time, because of dedication
good fortune through staying in the body

classical.hd_quote: Dedication in obscurity that is unexpectedly discovered.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Stay in the experience even when unseen; recognition comes later.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Quits early because no one is watching.

classical.hd_quote: A difficult and demanding nature that succeeds despite its behavior because of the depth of its talents.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Talent + embodiment convinces others even if the style is demanding.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Entitled presence that expects reward before it’s earned.

classical.hd_quote: A practical approach to good fortune that maintains the same patterns.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Keeps to what works; stays in the experience until complete.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Lets others’ projections interrupt the flow → stalled success.

classical.hd_quote: The ability, once recognized, to move rapidly from obscurity to influence.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Once seen, they externalize their experience and climb fast.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Forgets allies after success; appears ungrateful.

classical.hd_quote: The maintenance of proper rhythm that avoids radical divergence from successful patterns.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Honors the cycle that’s bringing luck but knows when to stop.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Lets others’ projections trap them in a dying pattern.

classical.hd_quote: The wisdom to secure one's identity through careful consideration of commitments.

interpretation.behavioral_axis: Only enters experiences that will feed back value to the collective.
interpretation.shadow_axis: Overextends and later must break promises.

meta.provenance: classical.hd_title and classical.hd_quote are verbatim (<25 words) from Ra Uru Hu’s Line Companion on Archive.org, section “HEXAGRAM 46 PUSHING UPWARD,” lines 46.1–46.6 (approx. L12023–L12243). Interpretations are original behavioral mappings aligned to the user's HD–S³ schema.
